Goal Representation:
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close_char(char, chair)
        # Ensure the character is close to the chair before sitting
        achieve on_char(char, chair)
        # Achieve the state of sitting on the chair

behavior sit_on_chair(chair:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, chair)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close_char(char, chair)
        sit_on_chair(chair)

behavior sit_on_chair(chair:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, chair) # Sit on the specified chair

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close_char(char, chair) and facing_char(char, chair)
        # Select the chair that is close to and facing the character
        sit_on_chair(chair)

behavior sit_on_chair(chair:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, chair)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and sittable(chair)
        # Select a chair that can be sat on
        sit_on_chair(chair)
